tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WindFarms (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE wind_farm_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    datetime TIMESTAMP,
    power_generated DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES wind_farm_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WindTurbines (
    turbine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    brand VARCHAR,
    height DECIMAL,
    rotor_diameter DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_location_id FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES WindFarmLocations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WindProduction (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    turbine_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    production_amount DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_turbine_id FOREIGN KEY (turbine_id) REFERENCES WindTurbines(turbine_id)
);
